title: Ticket #3651: condor is recording duplicate hold events in userlog
description:
See attached userlog. This is a minor problem in and of itself, but is also causing DAGMan to become confused (#3650).

Note: this is a scheduler universe job.
remarks:
condor_dagman just merrily increments the hold count whenever it sees a hold event, and does not check whether the job is on hold already (in its internal state) -- see #3650. Add some functions that check that DAGMan has accounted for the hold event already, and also that everything gets released eventually as well.

2013-May-28 14:48:04 by nwp:
LIGO says: periodic hold in scheduler universe causes this every time.
